summary: Fixed from_dict() to validate empty and whitespace-only text strings

approach.description: Added text validation in from_dict() method to strip whitespace and reject empty strings, consistent with rename() and CLI add() methods
changes: Strip whitespace from text field after string validation
Raise ValueError with 'cannot be empty' message for empty/whitespace-only text
Store stripped text in the Todo object

risks.description: This is a validation enhancement that rejects previously accepted invalid data. Data that was already valid will continue to work.
